fields.headline: Corrections and clarifications
fields.bodyText: • A feature on the Arctic referred to the Nansen Legacy as a new icebreaker that Norway had just launched. The Nansen Legacy is a Norwegian Arctic research project; the newly launched research vessel is called the Kronprins Haakon (A dying ocean, 8 June, page 38). • Lis Cashin’s byline is missing from the Experience column in tomorrow’s Weekend magazine (15 June, page 12). • Other recently corrected articles include: Ann Widdecombe show in Lancashire theatre to go ahead amid gay remarks row Universities condemn ‘catastrophic’ plan to link fees to graduate pay
